messages.text: "Did you know DHS received $80 million from CDC.  Called the Epidemiology & Laboratory Capacity Grant.  Appears to cover all the needs in Multnomah County.  I am going to find out more.  Learned about it on a zoom call today "

"Did you know DHS received $80 million from CDC.  Called the Epidemiology & Laboratory Capacity Grant.  Appears to cover all the needs in Multnomah County.  I am going to find out more.  Learned about it on a zoom call today "
"Good. Keep me posted thx. My labor conversations went well this morning. Carly can give you the latest updates. I'm optimistic will have this wrapped up this week."
"Has the chair called you yet about our comments regarding the expenditure on motels? I'm about to return her call."
"She was also glad to hear "
"No she hasn't but Susheela and I will talk at 2:30pm"
"Let me know if you have a statement you want read on your behalf or the council tomorrow "
"FYI--protest 100+ folks downtown 3rd & Main St police are monitoring "
"Any info "
"Thank you for offering to read my statement. We will get it to you around 10:15. Also I have overcome zoom and am now on the call. "
"Ok "
"Glad the protest was peaceful last night "
"Me too. "
"Do you know why the cares funds available are $74 million vs $117 million "
"Never mind Tom just answer my question "
"Sorry I'm   In the boondocks. Cutting in and out. "
"You should have my statement in your inbox. Thank you for reading it on my behalf. "
"No worries!  I am jealous.  Happy to read your statement "
"Thx!!"
"Liked ‚ÄúThx!!‚Äù"
"I got a little ill at the rally so they made me go home. I ask Nkenge to read your statement.  I"
"I'm so sorry you have to come back for this.  Chief Boone is on her way to pick me up "
"I've ask Mike Meyer to show up as well "
"Mental health check.  How are you?"
"I'm good thank you for asking. Took a couple of minutes off to watch the SpaceX launch. Cool stuff. How are you doing?"
"About to take a bath and go to bed.  Mentally and physically exhausted.  I will re-energize soon "
"Let me know if I can help you with anything "
"Good plan!  Thank you. Things are already heating up again back east. We should expect the same for tonight here."
"Are there curfews in effect back East?  The bath was great.  Sleep next "

"Mixed bag. I'm on a thread with Mayor's. Lots of varying opinions on this subject. Some cities are imposing curfews. Some like LA, or imposing curfews in certain areas. Others have decided not to do it at all."
"Interesting.  I am hopeful that activists who are committed to justice stay home "
"Agreed 100%."
"Please don't have a press conference tomorrow "
"Happy to talk about why"
"Governor Brown is on board for the community healing session but wants to do it either 6/3 or 6/4.  I will let you know when we confirm "
"Thx"
"Did you see the auditors in my opinion piece?  I will happily work on a response "
"Sorry which opinion piece? "
"I got a Oregonian this morning.  It's about us trying to undermine her independence "
"Hmmm. Ok. I'll look at it. "
"I didn't find it in the online version "
"Well then I guess I'll just have to wait. I'm that cheap."

"I spoke to Nkenge last night And explain the awkward situation I would be in if I with Drew. I think she understood. I expressed a strong desire to collaborate with her in anyway that she thinks would be helpful."
"Hahaha.  You are never gonna get lucky again if you are that cheap üòÇ"
"Ouch!"

"Liked ‚ÄúI spoke to Nkenge last night And explain the awkward situation I would be in if I with Drew. I think she understood. I expressed a strong desire to collaborate with her in anyway that she thinks would be helpful.‚Äù"
"You know that is true "
"Just be mindful of others self interest.  I don't trust the organizers to have your or the broader communities best interest in mind "
"Do you want to participate in the community healing session?"
"Yes if it would be helpful for me to be there. "
"I think it would. I will talk with the governor later today and confirm the details "
"Ok. Be aware I tend to draw my fans. "
"(You know what I mean...)"
"This will be well moderated with agreements at the beginning on how we will treat each other "
"Plus with zoom we can control the üé§ "
"Good plan. "
"Also totally support tonight's curfew"
"üëç"
"Hope you had a quieter day and some downtime "
"Haha Hahahahaha. Not a chance. "
"There's always a chance for hope right?"
"Indeed. "
"Call when you can "
"Will call shortly on call sorry. "
"Don't forget me "

"I haven't I've literally been on the call. I need to pull you off of the task force call to have a conversation with me and the chief. She indicates that you too may have reached a compromise she wanted to run by me. Can I call you right now with the chief"
"Yep calling now "
"Yes "
"That's so weird. My cell just cut out. Sorry about that. But thank you and yes let's continue to work well together."
"OK I just did your warm-up act take it from here!"
"I heard most of your interview and thought you did well.  You came off as sincere and committed to change "
"My office is working with Elizabeth Edwards to put together a criminal justice reform work session.  Inviting the AG, new DA and others "
"Ok"
"Are you seeing the madness downtown ?"

"Good afternoon Mayor! Few things before council:      1. There have been updates to the affordability amendment, council will be asking PHB to come back with a timeline to review SDC exemption program - all offices are in agreement with this approach and we support      2. Consent agenda was carried over from the morning, vote on that before the 2pm time certain      3. 398 and 399 have been pulled from the consent. Please take those up after the 2pm time certain. Randy Stenquist will be on the line. "
"Good updates, Tia. Thank you üôèüèº"
"That was great that you took the time to let him get to speak. Well done. "
"Thx. "

"Your staff didn't put the handoff to Kristen Minor after Joe Z in your run of show. Please invite her to speak after staff presentation. She will share the Landmarks Commission presentation with Maya Foty, Vice Chair. Thanks. "
"Ok"

"I know your team has been actively engaged in helping us all get through this weekend's events. I'm sorry I haven't had the opportunity to reach out in person to the degree that I would like. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or issues that need resolving. Thank you."

"Wow, that is so good of you to contact me. You are doing an outstanding job in partnership with Jo Ann. I figured it would be most helpful for me to stay out of the way but if there is anything I can do let me know. My team would be glad to put out a statement if yours and Jo Ann's feel that would be helpful and want to give guidance on content. It may be better to keep you and Jo Ann speaking for us all. "
"Also Tim and I were so sad at midnight last night when we heard about your mom. So very sorry. "
"Thank you. I really appreciate it."

"From the sidelines, it seems responding to community concerns and Comm H and deciding not to bring in National Guard might be a welcome step towards de-escalation. No reply needed, just wanted to give my two cents. "
"Want to continue conversation from CARES work session, get you back up to speed on 12-mo COVID shelter strategy. Can I set up a mtg next Tuesday (you have time) w Marc, Shannon, et al?"
"Yes"
"üëçüèº"
"This is good outcome. "
"Did we have a chief check In? I think it left my calendar. "
"Moved to the morning. "
"Roger that. I'm sort of expecting tonight to be worse than the prior two nights. My fellow mayors are texting that crowds are getting much bigger and significantly more tense"
"Will make sure Robert keeps us closely updated. We are all on standby for checkins as needed. "
"If you see a 5:30 briefing on your calendar please disregard!"
"Ok"
"Leadership,      Nicole and I feel we need to have a quick huddle to talk about our George Floyd response. Is everyone free at 5:30 pm? "
"I'm on a call with Jamal ab labor negotiations at 5:20. We could push to later if necessary. "
"I'm available"
"No worries. What time works, Sonia?"
"Sounds good"
"Join Zoom Meeting      https://us02web.zoom.us/j/4439635756?pwd=Tlo3S2VkeDdndzdBU25ETGxQckMxQT09            Meeting ID: REDACTED      Password: REDACTED"
"Can you email this link? Don't see it in inbox and would rather join by computer. Thanks. "

"Mayor, I spoke with DC Davis and everyone. They know the tweet is live.      We decided to not do a joint public statement.      But rather do a joint internal statement expressing our support for PPB and that this is not an attack against them.       Good?"
"üëçüèª"
"I called a friend, his reaction to the statement ,       beautiful, thank you, and it's never the wrong time to do the right thing "
"üôèüèª"
"Sorry I missed this. "
"All good üëçüèº"

"Leadership team,      Just got off the phone with Tina. At least two demonstrations planned tomorrow. 6 pm one of particular concern. Aggressive language about targeting police officers. Recommend a huddle today to go over scenarios. "
"Yes. Please coordinate with Aja. "
"Good "

"Brother Mayor, this is Pastor Hennessee. You are our Mayor. You have done an extraordinary job. In your re-election narrative please consider expanding your focus beyond homelessness/houselessness and include bridge building and healing between communities of color, initiate a drive (that can be a model to other Mayor's) toward eradicating racial and gender disparities, and an economic development/recovery plan insuring all people thrive. Just my unasked for two cents. Blessings to you, Matt "
"Good thoughts Matt. Agree. "

"With all due respect, I want this to be your narrative and not the narrative of someone who opposes you. Also, on the form of government, as a former City Manager and Police & Fire Commissioner I am not nor have been a fan of the Commission form of government. I know you are out front on that s. Again, my advice, if this form of government yields a majority Commission of color, your opposition needs to be a bit nuances. My suggestion is: 'we want our City government to be more responsive, efficient and effective.' End of my sermon. "
"Good sermon. ; )"
"I only have one short break in the next 6 1/2 hours. It just got filled with the PPB update. I'm fine with that, but I will be multitasking while I do it so I will attend by phone."

"I think if the police are going to close off the area around the justice center this should be messaged. We should consider the messaging that we are supporting demonstrations and protests in first amendment rights. We are closing off the area around the justice facility to protect the hundreds of individuals who are incarcerated there. We appreciate the publics understanding. Something like that whatever you guys decide."
"Copy. "
"Hold Tuesday evening campaign. "
"Got it "
"Need zoom link for phone. "
"Mayor- KATU would like to interview you this evening for a live 10 minute interview in preparation of tonight. 6:15 or 6:30 via zoom. Eileen wants you to do it.      can I schedule? "
"Yes. "
"Ok"
"Greetings- for this afternoon I was going to have security dressed casually meet you at SEI when you arrive so you can have your own car "
"Ok"
"ETA to SEI? "
"Reserved spot for you in lot"
"6 minutes"

"I mentioned earlier this week to a couple of you that I've been asked if I would like to read a statement at tomorrow's NAACP demonstration. I will be out of town so I cannot. Commissioner Hardesty is willing to read a statement on my behalf unless somebody from my office plans on doing it. But we will need a statement drafted if it has not already been drafted. Let me know your thoughts. This is voice text so if there's any mistakes my apologies."

"That's actually a great idea to have her read a statement on behalf of the council. The only problem is you know how hard it is to write a statement drafted by five people on a subject like this. She has offered to read a statement on my behalf, but if you convince her to do a council wide statement that would be great too. Jamaal can you take the lead on this?"
"Sorry about the typos in this like your name. I'm using voice text because I'm driving."

"Hey mayor- I suggested that Nike be the one to read on your behalf. She is a great fit, is perfect as OYVP repositions, it franchises her work, she's trusted in the community and would seem to be the person. I brought this up to her, and she agreed that she seems a natural fit."

"I would suggest we follow up with Nike. She did seem rather reluctant when we spoke last night.      Based off the purpose of the rally, It is more impactful for you to be there. Knowing that you can not, a strong ally like Commissioner, would be the best.       Another suggestion- I wonder if there could be a statement read by Commissioner Hardesty on behalf of the entire council?"
"The zoom link does not work by phone for my"
"Meeting"
"It says address invalid"
"I tried. I give up."
"I'm on now. Not sure why it wouldn't work. "
"Me too!"
"No staffing on OMSI??"
"No staff. "
"Oh. Ok. He didn't chime in. "
"Ok. I'm around. When. "
"Good. "
"I just sent you the email from Kimberly with the link "
"Trying to troubleshoot "
"Can you call?       669-900-9128      Meeting ID:REDACTED      Password: REDACTED      "
"I'm sorry! Glad you're there now "
"Jamal should be there "
"Sonia- can I have you jump on? "
"I joined but see that Jamal is also on. "
"Liked ‚ÄúOh. Ok. He didn't chime in. ‚Äù"
"Mayor- we want to schedule a briefing from PPB on intelligence for tonight "
"Sooner. I'm planning 7:15."

"One arrest made at three and Main. A car drove slowly into the crowd no injuries refused to back up officers attempted de-escalate suspect refuse to cooperate was taken into custody without incident."
"Thx for the update "
"It's been peaceful citywide but there is a group of about 25 or so gathered right on third Avenue in front of the justice center a handful of tents have gone up on the sidewalk as well "
"I am going to go to Peninsula Park at six I'll let you know how things are going."
"Appreciate it."
"Be safe"
"Peninsular park is full hundreds of people "
"Thank you"
"Thx"
"Thanks, Robert "
"Thank you for the updates. "
"Thx Robert "
"Love not hate was the chant "
"This speaker said police are serial killers and she is willing to die for her freedom.  Yes your voice your voice matters "
"They're talking about marching down to the justice center"
"I think a lot of the folks that are here will go home but A fair number of people will March to"
"Ok"

"Demonstrators are marching down MLK at about Broadway now, estimate between 200 to 250 people.       Walked right by North precinct & didn't do anything to North thankfully.       There's been some windows broken-wells Fargo and some spray painting along the way but no injuries no fights no arrests.       They are headed to the justice center.        Hopefully the group gets tired out it's a long way from Peninsula Park to Central precinct.       Chief Davis said he'd update me as things progressed"
"Thanks Robert. "

"Shooting just occurred,  unrelated to demonstration       On May 29, 2020, at 8:21 p.m., Central Precinct officers have responded to the 700 block of Northwest Flanders Street on reports that shots were fired in the area. When officers arrived they found an adult male victim with a gunshot wound to the chest. Officer applied a chest seal and the victim was transported to an area hospital by ambulance. The victim's medical status is unknown at this time.       Officers have secured the crime scene and the Gun Violence Reduction Team is responding to assist in the investigation.      The PIO is not responding to the scene.       "
"Another shooting just occurred near Farragut park Which is north of Lombard along albina.  I'll get details also unrelated to the demonstration"
"Appreciate the updates. Glad they didn't go after the precinct."
"Multnomah county side of justice center has been breached and they are inside causing damage "
"PPB is preparing to disperse the crowd"
"Lighting something on fire in the building "
"Windows broken on the justice center and vandalism and graffiti as well looks like most of it is happening on the third Avenue side"
"https://twitter.com/mrolmos/status/1266612979669143553?s=21"
"Katu just read the mayors tweet"
"Flash bangs being deployed looks like gas being deployed crowds being disbursed"
"There is word that there was a fire either inside or at or near the justice center"
"Crowd is dispersing to some extent"
"More flash bangs being thrown officers are moving the crowd and are continuing to message to leave the area would be subject to use the force interest"
"Media reports that the Verizon store on MLK had all his windows broken and was looted "
"broken into Pioneer Place looting "
"broken into Pioneer Place looting "
"trying to break the Apple store windows"
"Channel 6 camera crew just got pushed"
"Looks like a large fire in the intersection of fourth and Taylor police just arrived on scene looks like fires responding to"
"There's reports of a fire in a building Not sure of the location at this point possibly a clothing store"
"There's a car on fire looks like four & Taylor"
"PFB putting out the car fire"
"Car fires out"
"Apple store breached "
"Dumpster back on fire again"
"I appreciate the mayors words he just was extensively interviewed on KGW he did a great job"
"Thanks Robert "
"Thank you "
"Ted talking now on fox12"
"Chase bank on fire    "
"It looks like they mostly have control I'll check with Davis I think it makes sense to make the call so she's aware and informed and I'll get back with you"
"Chief Davis asked how long it would take for them to respond if needed. He's not calling for them now but wants to know the answer to that question"
"Fire bureau has the chase bank fire under control"
"Manny just called and wanted to know if the Mayor needs security detail. If so, when- specifically when a press conference happens"

"He will need it when the press conference happens tomorrow morning       probably 8 AM, Eileen will know better I'm not sure of the location at this point possibly MLK or somewhere in the downtown core yet to be determined"
"Ok"
"Who is the 6184 number?"
"Nike "
"Liked ‚ÄúNike ‚Äù"
"Press conference set for 8 am. Location likely city hall for security reasons. I'm still finalizing logistics. ROS will be long. ASL interpreter booked."
"Manny has been updated and ready "
"Ok "
"Eileen, please call Jamal and me. "
"Who has Jordan's old number now "
"Bob day "
"Thx. Monitoring. "
"I'm going to call the governor do we need the National Guard on standby?"
"All,       I spoke with the Mayor. He is coming back. He wants to set up a press conference with Chief Davis for 3 am-ish. Tina, will work with you.       "
"Copy "
"Tina, it will likely have to be around 6 am. Any further talk on Mayor's ETA should be handled over the phone not text. "
"Call me when you can "
"Tina will join me for the press event. "
"Tina will join me for the press event. "
"Awesome"

"Mike Myers suggests Disaster Policy Council meeting tomorrow. I recommend yes. Will stand by to see what time press and community events are confirmed for, will schedule around them.      On this text: Mayor, Jamal, Aja, Eileen, Mike Myers, Robert King"
"TY"
"Is the 6047 mike?"
"Copy "
"Thanks, Sonia. "
"Yes "
"Can we get someone to clean up the glass"
"Who is in charge of that "
"Thanks"
"That's what Mike Myers said the DPC will help with"
"I have it handled"
"Thank you Mike. "
"Thank you Director Myers. "
"I can't clean up until ppb is done with their evidence collection "
"üôèüèª"
"üëçüèª "
"Is the 8 AM for the press conference at City Hall firm if it is I'll let Pastor Hannassey know"
"Yes. We're going to do a separate walk at MLk later "
"Ok I'm going past your Hennessey know about 8 AM at City Hall"
"Can you get his email "
"I will send it to you"
"Liked ‚ÄúI will send it to you‚Äù"

"Chief Davis is in support of the curfew going into effect as soon as possible through Monday. I tried calling the mayor I believe he's in flight. I can brief him as soon as he lands and if he gives it a thumbs up I believe he can authorize Commissioner Hardisty to sign it.      Chief Davis is in touch with chief resch and I believe she'll be back either late in the day tomorrow or Sunday.       I let chief Davis know they'll be a meeting with general stencil tomorrow want him to be a part of probably after the press conference"
"Working on it."
"Copy"

"Pastor Hennessey's reached out to the faith community and will be a number of faith leaders at the press conference at 8 AM. Ron Herndon and other African-American community leaders will also be at the press conference"
"Cheap Davis has not indicated he wants them activated at this point"
"Liked ‚ÄúETA. 3am. ‚Äù"
"Copy. Thank you. "
"Thank you"
"I give a thumbs up. Approve curfew. "
"Sign it in my behalf or just use my approval here. "
"Don't give to a commissioner. Just put it in effect and I'll sign it in an hour. "
"I am giving my approval to enact an immediate curfew as required by PPB. Ted Wheeler. "
"Robert still no need for National Guard?"
"üëç"
"Ok. Keep me posted. "
"ETA. 3am. "
"Sorry. ETA 4am. "
"Enroute "
"Trying not to bother you. I'm being kept updated. "

"The Disaster Policy Council has been activated in response to last night's riots and declared state of emergency. Conference call at 10:30 am today . Please check your email for the Zoom meeting invite. For help contact PBEM Duty Officer pbemdutyofficer@portlandoregon.gov 503-823-2686.   Reply with YES to confirm receipt."

"The Disaster Policy Council has been activated in response to last night's riots and declared state of emergency. Conference call at 10:30 am today . Please check your email for the Zoom meeting invite. For help contact PBEM Duty Officer pbemdutyofficer@portlandoregon.gov 503-823-2686.   Reply with YES to confirm receipt."

"From PBA:  Thank u. All good. I know your busy. ALSO: need help a lot of gawkers and disaster tourists coming to downtown. Creating dangerous situations around the broken windows and damaged buildings. I think traffic control especially on yamhill needed      Also I don't have Chris Davis's phone number for some reason. Could I please get it?"
"I agree with the sentiment expressed above. I was surprised how many people were crowded around Apple taking photos."
"I think I have a media interview at that time. Could you please check with Aja?"
"Yes, on text thread with PBA, Eudaly office, PPB and PBOT ab traffic control."
"We are scheduling leadership team call at 6. Will have additional updates then. "
"Rest if you can. "
"üëçüèº"
"I want to make sure we're communicating with Commissioner Fritz and Eudaly. "
"Yes. Tim and Marshall were on DPC call and I will call each of them in the next two hours. "
"Team, we are going to have a check-in at 5:45pm before this evening and the Mayor's interviews. Zoom info coming shortly"
"Sounds good. "
"What are interviews regarding?"
"Prep time setup at 5 am for tonight's KATU interview. Zoom info in appointment. "
"üôè"
"We're on it.   "
"Ok I will find out"
"Are you in?"
"Been here since 5:30ish. Still waiting for Tina to organize."
"Commissioner Hardesty just sent me a text asking us not to have a press conference tomorrow. Can somebody reach out to her staff and find out why?"
"They have not let me into the zoom yet. "
"Back on 503-823-9789, have Chief Davis"
"We have a spot reserved for you in the parking lot. Marked with 2 orange cones on the left as you come in."
"I'll be awhile yet. "
"No problem. "

"Chief Resch and sheriff Reese are requesting the National Guard respond to assist as soon as possible.       The situation on the ground is similar to what happened yesterday already in front of the justice center. The operational need  exists for the guard  to provide site security to protect the justice center.  This will free up our resources to respond more effectively to emerging threats throughout the city.      Mayor My next step includes calling chief Davis and then conference in Constantine severe to ask for their immediate response if you approve.      Additionally sheriff Reese will reach out to Constantine and make the request as sheriff as well"
"Thank you Robert. This approach and request is consistent with the strategy we discussed with the Governor earlier today. "
"Watching the PCCEP meeting, FYI. So far, close to 250 attendees."
"Is there a link?"
"Link at the top:"
"https://www.portlandoregon.gov/pccep/index.cfm?&a=761768"
"Nik, would like to speak with Governor ASAP ab National Guard support. Can we get on a quick call? We have conf line we can use if so. "
"Yes, this is that. Just spoke with Constantin. Working on 4:30 as tentative time. Will include us, Gov team, PPB, Sheriff. "
"4:30 confirmed by Constantin. Nik, we have a line or can use one of yours. Let me know. "

"Sonia I think Robert is going to try and put together a brief conference call with Nick and the governor that includes the chief and the sheriff and me. I texted the governor to let her know we were working on a call. "
"Robert, will you make sure to keep us closely apprised tonight?"
"Yes"
"Looking "
"Thank you "
"I'm seeing if the JIC can send me an email list of the links"
"Just emailed you some links"
"Thank you "
"Mayor, please call Robert or me for update"
"Forwarded email with MSNBC information for tonight. Segment starts around 8:50, but they'll call a bit before to establish connection. Calling this number of yours to do FaceTime. "
"Ok"
"Another great interview. Loved that you could use material from today's Community press conference. Thank you!"
"Thank you. "
"Robert is there a web URL for the eye in the sky?"
"üëç"
"Boss updated map in your in box strongly recommend approval and before our 1pm meeting "
"50 people gathered. "
"Yes, recommend approval of this approach ASAP. "
"Copy. "
"Approved"
"Mayor, PBOT will not support protest mgmt request from PPB unless/until you call Commissioner Eudaly. Chief, this sounds urgent - is that accurate?"
"Commissioner Eudaly is available at 3. You and Chief will call her. "
"Yes"
"Hoped you'd call Chief and patch in Commissioner. Can use 823-9789 if you'd rather, I'll let Marshall know. "
"Just talked to Marshall, he is trying to find her. "
" Ok thank you "
"Me too. "
"No I was in the park.  "
"I'll go try to watch now "
"Pkease schedule with me and Chief thx. "
"And commr Eudaly. "
"Does chief know"
"Info on call??"
"Ok "
"Nobody is answering."
"I'll try Com Eudaly again in a couple of minutes."
"She said no. "
"I'm more engaged In the governors press conference at the moment. "
"Without any further commentary Chief are you watching this? "

"The governors statement is in accurate and inflammatory. I had specifically requested the National Guard for limited use to defend facilities. To suggest that we would put them there for direct confrontation with protesters is incendiary."

"I spoke directly with the governor. She agrees that I never said anything of the sort and she believes her comments were taken out of context. I asked her to correct it because otherwise I would so she will have her team look at the quote."
"Can somebody stay on top of this and make sure that correction happens."

"I would rather we leave the last part of that out of the public statement I didn't realize it was going to the reporters. There were multiple people on the call and they all know I asked for limited uses to protect facilities. We didn't even discuss them being armed."
"The chief made a big deal about how they would have police officers interspersed who would be able to protect the National Guard troops if necessary."
"Have her talk to the chief. She was there. So were others."
"I believe Robert was on the call too. Didnt it just happen yesterday?"
"Eileen and I will watch and stay in touch. "
"Yes."
"I will reach out to the reporter too."
"Max said she won't include the second part "
"On the phone with her now"
"Max is asking if it was Saturday or Sunday "
"The ask"
"(Chief or Sonia do you feel comfortable speaking with Max off the record)"
"Or on the record "
"I prefer Chief as it's about the operational specifics of the ask. But I can absolutely confirm we were specific about support role so that our folks could do front line. "
"Yes I was there and I never requested front line support "

"Maxine looked into it. Governor wasn't misquoted. She said it in her prepared statement. Video is cued here. I asked her comms Director for an explanation. Will let you know. Maxine's story has been updated."
"https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=1049&v=edjN5Ptu3ag&feature=emb_logo"

"Jamal and Mayor: update for meeting with demonstrators tomorrow. Captain Lovell was already down the path putting a meeting together by the time we decided to do one, so you will be attending the conversation he's arranged with them. That's fine, you can offer in that meeting that next time you'd like to invite them to our space, to talk with you and your staff. Tomorrow will be justice system reps (DA, Sheriff, Chief, I believe) and we're planning for Nike to meet you there and staff. SEI, 10:30."
